name: COBOL Source Code File
summary: Learn about .COB files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: COBOL has several variants, including COBOL-68 (the original standard) and COBOL 2002, a more recent version of the language. Therefore, make sure you have the appropriate compiler and text editor for the version of COBOL you're using for development.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
